name: pncan2d
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c0), c1))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c0), c1), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c0), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c0), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c0), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c0), c1))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c0), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c0), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))

comment: Cancellation law for subtraction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
